name: Super Squid World
description:
Seong Gihun and Squid Game into Super Mario World.

This level is based on the Red Light, Green Light game. Get across the finish line with at least 1 piece of dalgona left and you'll pass. If you move while the light is red, bullet bill will shoot out towards you. Also, watch out for the squid guys.

Someone said it's like subspace emissary, I somewhat agree! 

Controls

  • Pause - P
  • Reset - R
  • Move - W, A, S, D, or arrow keys
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Q - Quit
  • Hold Left Mouse Button - Run

If you enjoy this at least even a little, please consider donating! This project took me over a month of my free time in figuring out the mechanics and building it out, a cup of coffee would be nice :)

Links: (includes- Paper Mages, Steam, Twitter, Instagram, Discord, Patreon) https://linktr.ee/gentlygiantllc 

Get a squid guy sticker here:

https://www.redbubble.com/i/poster/Squid-Guy-by-DavidJMacias/91525483.E40HW

Music: Tchaikovsky - Serenade for Strings Johann Strauss II - The Beautiful Blue Danube Haydn - Trumped Concerto in E Flat Jeremy Black - Shine On An Jone - Modern Time Patrick Patrikios - Know Myself Anno Domini Beats - Better inspectorj - cracking-crunching karolist - guitar-solo okieactor - heathers-gunshot-effect2 eelke - smack-hands tmkappelt - magazine-rip-fast
